rules_text:
Flash
[i]Preserve in time[/i] – When Kaguya enters, target permanent or player gains hexproof until end of turn.
[i]Return to the moon[/i] – When Kaguya leaves the battlefield, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
notes:

!tag Kaguya
